0: This level will introduce you to what makes this  encryption secure! This protocol is designed to work between two people, so let's see what happens if we add an unwanted listener!
1: Let's call this middle person the eavesdropper. For this level, you will be able to see that the eavesdropper is present and what their choices are, but your goal is to be able to detect if the eavesdropper is present
2: Here is the same kind of practice that you saw in level 0, go ahead and spend some time trying to see the impact of the eavesdropper.
